execution_quality: Efficient and direct—the agent made a single, focused CSS edit to address the stated problem without unnecessary complexity.
work_category: UI layout adjustment to constrain and center a screenshot element that was consuming excessive vertical space.
summary: The agent quickly implemented CSS constraints to limit screenshot size and center it, directly addressing the user's complaint about excessive screen usage. The single edit approach and lack of follow-up questions suggest strong understanding of the request. Session termination without feedback or corrections indicates the fix met expectations.
follow_up_pattern: Session ended without further messages, suggesting either approval of the fix or task completion.
